data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marathe, Kiran, Sanborn, Allen F., Kunte, Krushnamegh (2018): Revision of the genus Rustia Stål, 1866 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Cicadinae) including a generic synonymy, four new combinations, and two new species from the Western Ghats, India. Zootaxa 4457 (3): 431-443, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4457.3.5|3 occurrences
